quote: Health is a state of body. Wellness is a state of being.
name: J. Stanford

quote: Happiness lies first of all in health.
name: George William Curtis

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
name: Buddha

quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
name: Tom Stoppard

quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: There's nothing more important than our good health - that's our principal capital asset.
name: Arlen Specter

quote: The way you think, the way you behave, the way you eat, can influence your life by 30 to 50 years.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
name: Thomas Dekker

quote: Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Water is life, and clean water means health.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: But the real secret to lifelong good health is actually the opposite: Let your body take care of you.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Natural forces within us are the true healers of disease.
name: Hippocrates

quote: Mental health isn't all of me, but it's a massive part of my journey and a massive part of my whole being.
name: Adwoa Aboah

quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
name: Leigh Hunt

quote: Happiness is nothing but good health and freedom, and money is the single best way you can buy your freedom.
name: Scott Adams

quote: Mental health is often missing from public health debates even though it's critical to wellbeing.
name: Diane Abbott

quote: Looking after my health today gives me a better hope for tomorrow.
name: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: In the midst of these hard times it is our good health and good sleep that are enjoyable.
name: Knute Nelson

quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
name: Hippocrates

quote: A life coach does for the rest of your life what a personal trainer does for your health and fitness.
name: Elaine MacDonald

quote: True health infuses positive energy in the mind, body and spirit; it is a main focus in my life.
name: Maximillian Degenerez

quote: The more you worry, the more you throw off the delicate balance of hormones required for health.
name: Andrew J. Bernstein

quote: Unfortunately but absolutely fair to all, the one thing money can't buy is health - and happiness.
name: Yolanda Hadid

quote: My body is like breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I don't think about it, I just have it.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: With age comes the understanding and appreciation of your most important asset, your health.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Taking care of your mental and physical health is just as important as any career move or responsibility.
name: Mireille Guiliano

quote: Health is the soul that animates all the enjoyments of life, which fade and are tasteless without it.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: In a disordered mind, as in a disordered body, soundness of health is impossible.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Prevention is one of the few known ways to reduce demand for health and aged care services.
name: Julie Bishop

quote: View health as an investment, not an expense.
name: John Quelch

quote: Knowing your genetic health risks will help you make better decisions.
name: Anne Wojcicki

quote: You have to fight for your health and stay on top of it. Our bodies are meant to be healthy.
name: Laila Ali

quote: I've learned to trust myself that I'm going to make healthy choices because I care about my health.
name: Camila Mendes

quote: The most important thing for me is health - you wake up in the morning, you can breathe, and you can walk.
name: Mohamed Al-Fayed

quote: Gut health is the key to overall health.
name: Kris Carr

quote: The wellness and prevention market will outgrow the health care market.
name: Leroy Hood

quote: There is actually a physical connection between light and our health and wellbeing.
name: Rogier van der Heide

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says.
name: Naomi Judd

quote: I believe the greatest asset a head of state can have is the ability to get a good night's sleep.
name: Harold Wilson

quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
name: Anne Wilson Schaef
